title: Accelerating Charge Times: A 5-Year Journey of Technological Advancements and Customer Empowerment
tuit: Over the last 5 years, we've unlocked 30% faster charge times through a combination of hardware, software & customer educations

title: Sharp Decline in Water Height Measured by Satellite Altimeters Due to Drought and High Demand
tuit: These water height data were collected by satellite altimeters, sensors that measure the distance from a spacecraft to the water surface. The decline has been sharp since 2019 when severe drought limited recharge, and the demand for water has been high.

title: 100s of SpaceX Starships land on Mars after a 6 month journey. 1000s of Martian colonists being building Mars Base 1
tuit: You want to wake up in the morning and think the future is going to be great - and that’s what being a spacefaring civilization is all about. It’s about believing in the future and thinking that the future will be better than the past. And I can’t think of anything more exciting than going out there and being among the stars
